pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======Kio CLI=======.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/zalando-stups/kio-cli.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/zalando-stups/kio-cli :alt: Build Status.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/zalando-stups/kio-cli/badge.svg :target: https://coveralls.io/r/zalando-stups/kio-cli :alt: Code Coverage.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dw/stups-kio.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-kio/ :alt: PyPI Downloads.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/stups-kio.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-kio/ :alt: Latest PyPI version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/stups-kio.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-kio/ :alt: LicenseConvenience command line tool for Kio application registry... code-block:: bash $ sudo pip3 install --upgrade stups-kioUsage=====.. code-block:: bash $ kio appYou can also run it locally from source:.. code-block:: bash $ python3 -m kioRunning Unit Tests==================.. code-block:: bash $ python3 setup.py test --cov-html=trueReleasing=========.. code-block:: bash $ ./release.sh <NEW-VERSION>
